comments.comments_text: Niklas Dorsch (Augsburg) takes the corner, but it's intercepted by the defender.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Roland Sallai hands Nils Petersen (Freiburg) the simplest of tasks from close range after the cross evaded the keeper, and he makes no mistake with his header into the roof of the net. 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] hands [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) the simplest of tasks from close range after the cross evaded the keeper, and he makes no mistake with his header into the roof of the net. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Woo-Yeong Jeong (Freiburg) collects a simple pass and decides to shoot from distance. It's a swerving effort aimed towards the roof of the net, but Rafal Gikiewicz reads it well and makes a comfortable save. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Freiburg will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

[TEAM] will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Florian Niederlechner passes to Michael Gregoritsch (Augsburg), who collects the ball and unleashes a terrific shot from the edge of the box. His effort goes into the bottom left corner. Fabulous goal! The score is 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Nico Schlotterbeck (Freiburg) was in the right place at the right time to pounce on the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball home. It's 1:2.
